member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE
member.summary: Defines values for the feature that are supported by the logical unit (CD and DVD device).

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_PROFILE_LIST
member.summary: Identifies profiles supported by the logical unit.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CORE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that supports functionality common to all devices.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_MORPHING
member.summary: Identifies the ability of the logical unit to notify an initiator about operational changes and accept initiator requests to prevent operational changes.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_REMOVABLE_MEDIUM
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has a medium that is removable.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_WRITE_PROTECT
member.summary: Identifies reporting capability and changing capability for write protection status of the logical unit.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_RANDOMLY_READABLE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to read data from logical blocks specified by Logical Block Addresses.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CD_MULTIREAD
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that conforms to the OSTA Multi-Read specification 1.00, with the exception of CD Play capability (the CD Audio Feature is not required).

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CD_READ
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to read CD specific information from the media and is able to read user data from all types of CD blocks.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_READ
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to read DVD specific information from the media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_RANDOMLY_WRITABLE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to write data to logical blocks specified by Logical Block Addresses.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_INCREMENTAL_STREAMING_WRITABLE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to write data to a contiguous region, and is able to append data to a limited number of locations on the media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_SECTOR_ERASABLE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that supports erasable media and media that requires an erase pass before overwrite, such as some magneto-optical technologies.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_FORMATTABLE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that can format media into logical blocks.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_HARDWARE_DEFECT_MANAGEMENT
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has defect management available to provide a defect-free contiguous address space.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_WRITE_ONCE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to record to any previously unrecorded logical block.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_RESTRICTED_OVERWRITE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to overwrite logical blocks only in fixed sets at a time.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CDRW_CAV_WRITE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to write CD-RW media that is designed for CAV recording.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_MRW
member.summary: Indicates that the logical unit is capable of reading a disc with the MRW format.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_ENHANCED_DEFECT_REPORTING
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to perform media certification and recovered error reporting for logical unit assisted software defect management.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_PLUS_RW
member.summary: Indicates that the logical unit is capable of reading a recorded DVD+RW disc.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_PLUS_R
member.summary: Indicates that the logical unit is capable of reading a recorded DVD+R disc.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_RIGID_RESTRICTED_OVERWRITE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to perform writing only on Blocking boundaries.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CD_TRACK_AT_ONCE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to write data to a CD track.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CD_MASTERING
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to write a CD in Session at Once mode or Raw mode.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_DASH_WRITE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to write data to DVD-R/-RW in Disc at Once mode.

summary.para: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to read double density CD specific information from the media.
summary.div: Note This value has been deprecated.

summary.para: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to write to double density CD media.
summary.div: Note This value has been deprecated.

summary.para: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to write to double density CD-RW media.
summary.div: Note This value has been deprecated.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_LAYER_JUMP_RECORDING
member.summary: Identifies a drive that is able to write data to contiguous regions that are allocated on multiple layers, and is able to append data to a limited number of locations on the media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CD_RW_MEDIA_WRITE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has the ability to perform writing CD-RW media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_BD_PSEUDO_OVERWRITE
member.summary: Identifies a drive that provides Logical Block overwrite service on BD-R discs that are formatted as SRM+POW.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_PLUS_R_DUAL_LAYER
member.summary: Indicates that the drive is capable of reading a recorded DVD+R Double Layer disc

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_BD_READ
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to read control structures and user data from the Blu-ray disc.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_BD_WRITE
member.summary: Identifies a drive that is able to write control structures and user data to writable Blu-ray discs.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_HD_DVD_READ
member.summary: Identifies a drive that is able to read HD DVD specific information from the media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_HD_DVD_WRITE
member.summary: Indicates the ability to write to HD DVD-R/-RW media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_POWER_MANAGEMENT
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to perform initiator and logical unit directed power management.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_SMART
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to perform Self-Monitoring Analysis and Reporting Technology (S.M.A.R.T.).

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_EMBEDDED_CHANGER
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to move media from a storage area to a mechanism and back.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_CD_ANALOG_PLAY
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to play CD Audio data directly to an external output.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_MICROCODE_UPDATE
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to upgrade its internal microcode via the interface.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_TIMEOUT
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to always respond to commands within a set time period.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_CSS
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to perform DVD CSS/CPPM authentication and key management. This feature also indicates that the logical unit supports CSS for DVD-Video and CPPM for DVD-Audio.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_REAL_TIME_STREAMING
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to perform reading and writing within initiator specified (and logical unit verified) performance ranges. This Feature also indicates whether the logical unit supports the stream playback operation.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_LOGICAL_UNIT_SERIAL_NUMBER
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that has a unique serial number.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_MEDIA_SERIAL_NUMBER
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is capable of reading a media serial number of the currently installed media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DISC_CONTROL_BLOCKS
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to read and/or write Disc Control Blocks from or to the media.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_DVD_CPRM
member.summary: Identifies a logical unit that is able to perform DVD CPRM and is able to perform CPRM authentication and key management.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_FIRMWARE_INFORMATION
member.summary: Indicates that the logical unit provides the date and time of the creation of the current firmware revision loaded on the device.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_AACS
member.summary: Identifies a drive that supports AACS and is able to perform AACS authentication process.

member.name: IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_FEATURE_PAGE_TYPE_VCPS
member.summary: Identifies a Drive that is able to process disc data structures that are specified in the VCPS.
